author: BBT
title: Business Travel Consultant - Altrincham £19K
text:
Business Travel Consultant - Altrincham £19K 0 comments £10k to £20k 
Business Travel Consultant - Altrincham, Cheshire £19k, 3 per cent performance related bonus. Our client is a large market leading, successful company with its own in house Business Travel team. They are looking for a Business Travel Consultant to join their team due to rapid expansion.The responsibilities of the Business Travel Consultant are: Working on client side the Business Travel Consultant will coordinate all of the travel requirements for staff and contractors Follow profiles and adhere to company policy Amend existing bookings Using Galileo to book flights 
The skills required for the Business Travel Consultant: Experienced in using Galileo is highly advantageous Knowledge of booking flights, hotels and car hire Knowledge of net and published fares Outstanding organisational skills Able to conduct oneself in a professional manner and provide excellent customer service 
The Business Travel Consultant would ideally suit a dynamic person from a Leisure Travel background wishing to work in a Business Travel.You will be rewarded with a competitive salary, team incentives, great working environment, personal development and progression, as well as a flexible benefits package including; childcare, pensions, dental and health care, gym membership, discounted shopping for all major retail chains, as well as free parking, cycle to work and car schemes, an extra days holiday for your birthday and a 4pm finish every Friday.To apply for the Business Travel Consultant, please click on the link below or call Prospect4Corporate Travel on.Alternatively apply online via our website where you can register your CV, get job alerts and see all of our current vacancies.
